meanings: wait, hold on, (informal) hang on, (예정된 일·사람 등을) expect, (formal) await, (고대하다) look forward to
실용회화-기타 I believe you're waiting for me.
실용회화-예약 안했을 때 Please have a seat here while you wait.

examples.korean: A hush descended over the waiting crowd. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 기다리는 사람들 사이에 침묵이 감돌았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: They got bored waiting for him and sloped off. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 그를 기다리는 것이 지루해서 슬그머니 달아나 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They got bored waiting for him and sloped off. Add to Wordbook
